statements: SELECT * FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_type='kind' ORDER BY character_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT character_id, behavior_type FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_type='brave' AND character_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_description='caring' LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2;
SELECT behavior_type, character_id FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_type='adventurous' ORDER BY behavior_type ASC, character_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'aggressive';
SELECT character_id, behavior_type FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'friendly' ORDER BY character_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_description FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE character_id = '123456' LIMIT 1;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%excited%' ORDER BY behavior_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM CharacterBehavior WHERE behavior_description IS NOT NULL AND behavior_type = 'curious';
SELECT * FROM virtual_characters;
SELECT id, name, behavior FROM virtual_characters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, behavior FROM virtual_characters WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM virtual_characters ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_characters WHERE behavior='friendly' OR behavior='aggressive';
SELECT * FROM virtual_characters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, behavior FROM virtual_characters WHERE behavior = 'aggressive';
SELECT * FROM virtual_characters WHERE behavior LIKE '%friendly%';
SELECT id, name, behavior FROM virtual_characters WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, behavior FROM virtual_characters WHERE behavior = 'calm' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM character_data;
SELECT character_name, ar_experience FROM character_data WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT character_name, log_timestamp FROM character_data JOIN character_logs ON character_data.character_id = character_logs.character_id;
SELECT action_name, action_description FROM character_actions ORDER BY action_name DESC;
SELECT character_name, log_details FROM character_data INNER JOIN character_logs ON character_data.character_id = character_logs.character_id WHERE log_details LIKE '%completed%';
SELECT * FROM character_data WHERE ar_experience > 100;
SELECT character_name, ar_experience FROM character_data WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT character_actions.action_name, character_logs.log_timestamp FROM character_actions INNER JOIN character_logs ON character_actions.action_id = character_logs.action_id;

SELECT character_data.character_name, character_logs.log_details FROM character_data INNER JOIN character_logs ON character_data.character_id = character_logs.character_id WHERE character_data.character_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM character_data WHERE ar_experience < 50 OR is_active = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM VirtualCharacter;
SELECT name, age, location FROM VirtualCharacter WHERE age > 18;
SELECT character_id, gender FROM VirtualCharacter WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM CharacterActions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, item_name, quantity FROM CharacterInventory WHERE character_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM VirtualCharacter WHERE age > 18;
SELECT name, gender FROM VirtualCharacter WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VirtualCharacter WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT character_id, name, action_name, timestamp FROM VirtualCharacter JOIN CharacterActions ON VirtualCharacter.character_id = CharacterActions.character_id;
SELECT * FROM CharacterActions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Character;
SELECT character_id, character_name FROM Character WHERE character_type = 'Hero';
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM Location WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM Action ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type, description FROM Behavior WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Character WHERE character_type = 'Hero' ORDER BY character_name DESC, character_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT character_name, action_name, timestamp FROM Character c INNER JOIN Action a ON c.character_id = a.character_id WHERE action_type = 'Attack' AND approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT character_name, item_name, quantity FROM Character c INNER JOIN Inventory i ON c.character_id = i.character_id WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY character_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Behavior WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY approved_status ASC, behavior_type DESC;
